result.execSummary:
The defendant Billy J Staves was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 15CF132, 14CF74, 14CF432, 14CF323, 14CF75 Defendant Billy J Staves in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Billy J Staves in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 2:21pm 

14CF74    Ct 1 w/o repeater- State filed motion to vacate previous plea, Def does not object. Def- plea of NC. State to file Amended Info striking repeater. 
14CF323  Ct 2 w/repeater- Def plea of NC. 
14CF432  Ct 2 w/repeater- Amended Info filed. Def plea of NC.

CT accepts pleas, finds G, enters JOCs. All other cases & Cts DRI. Also, DRI uncharged gas drive off in Barron Cty in amount of $43.07. If DRI'ed in another county and proof provided, will subtract from total. 

CT vacates DC-31 from 14CF75 that is unsigned but date stamped. CT signs DC-31 that State provides. 

SENTENCING: 
14CF74- 3 YRS 6 MOS: 1.5 IC, 2 ES consecutive to 14CF75. DNA surcharge, no sample. 
14CF323: 1 IC, 1 ES- concurrent to 14CF74 and 14CF75. 
14CF432: 1 IC, 1 ES- concurrent to 14CF323 and 14CF74 and 14CF75.

No contact with Walmart in SCF, WI or Vicki Erickson or Rick Madsen.  

no fine/cost on any. 

Atty Chapman to determine sent cred on all files. 3:30pm adj.

Defendant Billy J Staves in court with attorney Francis X. Rivard.  Defendant Billy J Staves in custody.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk  9:07AM  Will be seating 20 jurors.  Each Atty will get 4 strikes.  No alternate juror for one day trial.  Ex: 8-10 O/R (exhabits are certified JOCs).  Off record.  9:12AM Back on record.  10:49AM Not enough Jurors showed up for the trial.  Jurors have been released.  Def signed plea agreement.  Will be pleading to Attempted Retail Theft still with repeater - enhancer.  DAs Office will be filing Amended Information.  Defendant S/T.  Def enters plea of G.  Court -  Finds that the def is entering plea FVIK.  Accepts plea of G and finds G to amended charge.  May not vote, Cannot hold public office.  If not US citizen may face deportation.  NO possess/use firearms or body armor.  Must provide DNA sample.  Will wait to schedule sentencing until we see outcome of other cases.  Bonds continue.  adj.  11:03AM
